titleStmt.title: A strange and wonderfull prognostication: or rather, prenomination of those accidents which shall, or at least are likely to happen as may be coniectured by the rules and directions of astrology, in this yeare 1624. Written by Anthonio Magini, an Italian professor of the mathematickes, and much experienced in astonomy. And now faithfully translated into English.
titleStmt.author: Magini, Giovanni Antonio, 1555-1617.

titleStmt.title: A strange and wonderfull prognostication: or rather, prenomination of those accidents which shall, or at least are likely to happen as may be coniectured by the rules and directions of astrology, in this yeare 1624. Written by Anthonio Magini, an Italian professor of the mathematickes, and much experienced in astonomy. And now faithfully translated into English.
titleStmt.author: Magini, Giovanni Antonio, 1555-1617.

notesStmt.note: Print faded and show-through; some pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
